=== Vocatives: coi/doi family with optional DOhU ===

# Simple greeting
coi do do'u
---
(source_file (vocative (coi) (term (sumti (do))) (dohu)))

# Addressing with doi requires a term
doi la .djan. do'u
---
(source_file (vocative (doi) (term (sumti (la) (cmene))) (dohu)))

# Vocative as preface to a statement
coi do do'u mi tavla
---
(source_file (vocative (coi) (term (sumti (do))) (dohu)) (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (brivla))))

# Without explicit DOhU (allowed)
coi mi
---
(source_file (vocative (coi) (term (sumti (mi)))))

# Other heads in the COI family
ki'e do do'u
---
(source_file (vocative (coi) (term (sumti (do))) (dohu)))

mi'e .alis.
---
(source_file (vocative (coi) (term (sumti (cmene)))))
